title: Pset_DistributionPortPHistoryDuct
description: Fluid flow performance history attached to an instance of IfcPerformanceHistory assigned to IfcDistributionPort.  This replaces the deprecated IfcFluidFlowProperties for performance values.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: Temperature of the fluid. For air this value represents the dry bulb temperature.

WetBulbTemperature.title: WetBulbTemperature
WetBulbTemperature.description: Wet bulb temperature of the fluid; only applicable if the fluid is air.

VolumetricFlowRate.title: VolumetricFlowRate
VolumetricFlowRate.description: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.

MassFlowRate.title: MassFlowRate
MassFlowRate.description: The mass flow rate of the fluid.

FlowCondition.title: FlowCondition
FlowCondition.description: Defines the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.
